News.Title: MMP Industries Reports 30% Jump in Net Profit to 60M Rupees
News.Summary: MMP Industries reported net profit of 60 million rupees compared to 46 million rupees in the same quarter last year, representing a 30% increase. The company's revenue grew to 1.9 billion rupees from 1.45 billion rupees year-over-year, marking a 31% rise in quarterly revenue.

News.Title: MMP Industries Reports Q1 Net Loss of 70M Rupees Despite Revenue Growth
News.Summary: MMP Industries reported a net loss of 70 million rupees in Q1, compared to a profit of 99 million rupees in the same period last year. The company's revenue increased to 1.8 billion rupees from 1.55 billion rupees year-over-year, showing growth in the top line despite the bottom line turning negative.

News.Title: MMP Industries Reports Fire Damage of 150-200 Million Rupees
News.Summary: MMP Industries has announced that a fire incident on April 11 has resulted in a loss of inventory and damage to plant and machinery. The company estimates the total loss to be between 150 to 200 million rupees.
